name: Trajectory (itch) (repardeimaj)
description:
Carefully plan the trajectory of your ball as you shoot through endless obstacles at increasing difficulty! Play again and again to see if you can reach a new high score!

• Collect coins and gems to spend in the shop!

• Enhance your in-game experience by customizing your surroundings. Buy new ball skins, backgrounds, and even trails!

• Ear extra rewards from achievements that will put your skill to the test!

• Check the leaderboard to see how you place world-wide!

YOU could be the next #1 ranked player! Download Trajectory today and find out.

Don't forget to show your support by writing a review or following us on Instagram - @trajectorygame
